item.title: About Eric Peña
item.description: I am a Complex Systems Science graduate student and Clifford D. Clark Fellow at State University of New York at Binghamton. Email: eric.pena@binghamton.edu Twitter: @ericpenaphysics Experience Statistics and Probability Teacher, example, — * — (…) Data Analyst, example, — * — (…) Technical Manager, example, July 2018 - Present (…) Physics Teacher, example, July 2018 - Present Taught incoming Engineering minority students Physics Classroom Assistant, example, July 2018 - Present Physics Demonstrations Department Projects Website Notes, ericpena.
